about_the_game:
Secret Bureau is an exhilarating single-player, first-person adventure game available for both PC and Virtual Reality (PCVR Meta) in the same software package.

Players will navigate hostile territories, infiltrate enemy bunkers, disguise themselves, and engage with spies to thwart the nefarious plans of the Betalog Corporation. The game combines intense action with strategic gameplay, encouraging players to overcome a variety of challenges to achieve their mission.

Designed with a cinematic concept reminiscent of blockbuster franchises like “Mission: Impossible” and “007.”

content_descriptors.notes: Secret Bureau is a first-person shooter that contains graphic and explicit scenes of violence. Throughout the game, players will engage in intense combat with soldiers and mercenaries, featuring gunfire and blood effects. Additionally, in one specific mission, the player must cut off an enemy general's hand to use their fingerprints to open a door, which may be disturbing to some players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 2
  • Additional Notes: The video game can be played in first-person mode on desktop, and there is also the option to run it in PC VR mode for a more immersive experience.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest 3
  • Additional Notes: The video game can be played in first-person mode on desktop, and there is also the option to run it in PC VR mode for a more immersive experience.
